content: Define WebApi  `WhoAmI` invocation and response schema

WhoAmI | Retrieves the system user ID for the currently logged on user or the user under whose context the code is running.  
>[Reference](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/customer-engagement/web-api/whoami?view=dynamics-ce-odata-9)

import * as WebApiClient from '@bsorrentino/xrmtoolboxweb-webapiclient'

export interface Response {
    BusinessUnitId: string
    OrganizationId: string
    UserId: string
}

export const Invoke = () => 
    WebApiClient.Instance.Execute<Response>(WebApiClient.WhoAmIRequest) as Promise<Response>

### Define App react component


`acquireTokenSilent()`:   allows to acquire access token for WebApi call


`scopes`: contains the scopes provided to acquiring access token
